H0.text: what instruments did louis armstrong play. Trumpet

H1.text: what instruments did louis armstrong play. Piano

H2.text: what instruments did louis armstrong play. Trombone

H3.text: what instruments did louis armstrong play. Cornet

A4.text: Armstrong developed his cornet skills by playing in the band.

A5.text: Armstrong became one of the first jazz musicians to be featured on extended trumpet solos, injecting his own personality and style.

A6.text: his switch from cornet to trumpet is often cited as heralding the trumpet's dominance over the cornet in jazz.

A7.text: Louis Armstrong started off on the cornet.

A8.text: Louis Armstrong switched to the trumpet.
